location: New Dongxie Street Lane 51, Songshan District, near Minsheng Roundabout and Carrefour, 1116m to Nanjing-Sanmin MRT
notes: Large 3BR/3BA ground-floor apartment (50 ping) in quiet alley near Minsheng Roundabout. Well-furnished with full appliances, south-facing with balcony for natural light. Ground floor is convenient for stroller access but 1F units may have humidity/pest concerns; the balcony needs railing check for baby safety. No pets allowed. Condition unclear from description alone - request photos to verify modernity and cleanliness. Broker listing with service fees.
